question: 先祖
sourceMnemonic: Your <kanji>previous</kanji> <kanji>ancestor</kanji>s are your <vocabulary>ancestors</vocabulary>. All ancestors are previous to you, after all, unless you want to talk time travel, then who knows.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Just remember there is a rendaku that changes <ja>そ</ja> to <ja>ぞ</ja>！
